Self.Wiki: This map object represents an interaction within the map.

ObjActEntityID.Wiki: The entity ID of this ObjAct.

ObjActPartName.Wiki: The part that this ObjAct targets.

ObjActParamID.Wiki: The ObjAct parameters this interaction uses.

ObjActState.Wiki: The interaction state this interaction uses.

EventFlagID.Wiki: The event flag this ObjAct sets upon interaction.
